creator: Richard@benfatto.com
text:
Installed Apache on WIN2K ADVANCED SERVER with SP3. THERE IS NO WAY TO SHUT 
DOWN APACHE. IT CRASHES and produces Blue screen of death.
Same version installed under WIN2K PRO SP3 NOT a PROBLEM
